ing: 6 cups all-purpose flour, or more as needed
1/4 cup milk, or more as needed
des: "A sour cream-based dough for your pierogi. Fill with your favorite fillings, such as potatoes and cheese or sauerkraut."
ins: Whisk flour, salt, eggs, sour cream, and milk together in a bowl. Add extra flour as needed to make dough less sticky.
